summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6237 for the improvement of 8th Ave. Northeast from East 85th Street to East 92nd Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89522, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
